title: Video shows moments before former Indian lawmaker and brother are shot on live TV
description: Video shows the moments before a former Indian lawmaker and his brother were fatally shot on live TV. Atiq Ahmad and his brother, Ashraf Ahmad, were under police escort on their way to a medical checkup when three men posing as journalists targeted them.

title: U.S. government urges Americans in Sudan to shelter in place amid conflict
description: The death toll is rising in Sudan after a second day of fighting between the country’s army and a powerful paramilitary force. The United States government is urging Americans in Sudan to shelter in place. NBC News’ Josh Lederman reports.

title: Watch: Sudan TV broadcast interrupted by gunfire amid military clashes
description: Loud bangs could be heard during a Sudan TV broadcast from a studio in the city of Omdurman as tensions between the Sudanese army and the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces escalated.

title: Shooting at Mexico resort leaves 1 child, 6 adults dead
description: A group of gunmen opened fire at a resort in Mexico killing six adults and a child. The shooting occurred in Cortazar, one of Mexico’s most dangerous states for years, as the Jalisco drug cartel has waged war on local groups.

title: Gunmen attack Mexico resort, killing 6 adults and a child
description: A group of gunmen opened fire at a resort in Mexico on Saturday, killing a child and six adults as well as injuring at least one other person.

title: Apartment building blaze in Dubai kills 16, injures 9
description: A fire swept through an apartment building in an older neighborhood of Dubai in the United Arab Emirates, killing at least 16 people and injuring another nine, authorities said Sunday.

title: Former Indian lawmaker and his brother shot dead live on TV
description: A former Indian lawmaker convicted of kidnapping and facing murder and assault charges was shot dead along with his brother in a dramatic attack that was caught live on TV in northern India, officials said Sunday.

title: South Korea fires warning shots after North’s boat crosses sea border
description: South Korea fired warning shots toward a North Korean vessel that crossed the maritime border, South Korea’s military said on Sunday, a day after the incident that further raised tension over the North’s missile tests.
